verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַת֙ <WH8141> bish-Nat year שְׁבַֽע־ <WH7651> she-va'- seven עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> 'es-Reh teen שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> sha-Nah, year לְפֶ֖קַח <WH6492> le-Fe-kach of Pekah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son רְמַלְיָ֑הוּ <WH7425> re-mal-Ya-hu; of Remaliah מָלַ֛ךְ <WH4427> ma-Lach began to reign אָחָ֥ז <WH271> 'a-Chaz Ahaz בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יוֹתָ֖ם <WH3147> yo-Tam of Jotham מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah
